title: Day 12 - Learned about Blender and Cryptocurrency
content:
• In the Blender course, I learned about Edge Rings, Boolean Modifiers, and many more options in Blender. Today I made a low poly chess set.
  • Today I watched the third episode of Cryptocurrency Investing Masterclass. I learned about the uses of cryptocurrency and the various exchanges where crypto is bought and sold. The process of buying and selling is made frictionless by the crypto exchanges.
author: Aarush Popli
metadesc: In the Blender course, I learned about Edge Rings, Boolean Modifiers, and many more options in Blender. Today I made a low poly chess set. ...
